greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between A032742 (the largest proper divisor of n) and its Möbius transform (A300236).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Fold[Function[{a, n}, Append[a, {Abs@ Total@ Map[MoebiusMu[n/#] a[[#, -1]] &, Most@ Divisors@ n], n/FactorInteger[n][[1, 1]]}]], {{0, 1}}, Range[2, 105]][[All, 1]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 10 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 10 2018
